sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>commander</radical>'s <radical>alcohol</radical> is really just <kanji>soy sauce</kanji>. When he goes out to drink with his troops and they all get drunk together, he manages to have fun and stay sober by drinking down a tasty, non-alcoholic pint of soy sauce.
meaningInfo: The next time you go to a bar, order yourself a commander's alcohol. It's like saying you want a Roy Rogers or a Shirley Temple, except it isn't pretty and it tastes horrible.
readingMnemonic: <kanji>Soy sauce</kanji> also happens to be the <reading>Shou</reading>gun's (<ja>しょう</ja>) favorite drink. Unfortunately, he can't just tell people he likes drinking glasses of soy sauce, or they'll look at him weird. Instead he orders it as a commander's alcohol too.
readingInfo: Picture the Shougun sitting on his throne, guzzling down some salty, brown soy sauce. It's splashing on his robes and the smell is making his assistants gag.
